column4: ok, I'm having a large issue. I've upgraded to Feisty, by changing all the 'edgy' entries in my sources.list file to 'feisty'. I then do 'sudo aptitude update' 'sudo aptitude upgrade' and 'sudo aptitude dist-upgrade'. All seems to install well, but when I reboot, nothing happens. It just sits there. I press 'control alt f1' and I see a strange error. I cannot see the entire thing because the text is very large.
so there were probably too many third party entries in your sources.list ... see !upgrade on how to do it right
